name: Accurate Attack
details: When you make an accurate attack (see Maneuvers, page 249) you can take a penalty of up to –5 on the effect modifier of the attack and add the same number (up to +5) to your attack bonus.
summary: Trade effect DC for attack bonus.

name: Agile Feint
details: You can use your Acrobatics bonus or movement speed rank in place of Deception to feint and trick in combat as if your skill bonus or speed rank were your Deception bonus (see the Deception skill description). Your opponent opposes the attempt with Acrobatics or Insight (whichever is better).
summary: Feint using Acrobatics skill or Speed rank

name: All-out Attack
details: When you make an all-out attack (see Maneuvers, page 249) you can take a penalty of up to –5 on your active defenses (Dodge and Parry) and add the same number (up to +5) to your attack bonus
summary: Trade active defense for attack bonus.

name: Animal Empathy
summary: Use Interaction skills normally with animals.

name: Artificer
summary: Use Expertise (Magic) to create temporary magical devices.

name: Assessment
summary: Use Insight to learn an opponent's combat capabilities.

name: Attractive
summary: Circumstance bonus to interaction based on your looks.

name: Beginner's Luck
summary: Spend a hero point to gain 5 temporary ranks in a skill.

name: Benefit
summary: Gain a significant perquisite or fringe benefit.

name: Chokehold
summary: Suffocate an opponent you have successfully grabbed.

name: Close Attack
summary: +1 bonus to close attack checks per rank.

name: Connected
summary: Call in assistance or favors with a Persuasion check.

name: Contacts
summary: Make an initial Investigation check in one minute.

name: Daze
summary: Use Deception or Intimidation to daze an opponent.

name: Defensive Attack
summary: Trade attack bonus for active defense bonus.

name: Defensive Roll
summary: +1 active defense bonus to Toughness per rank.

name: Diehard
summary: Automatically stablize when dying.

name: Eidetic Memory
summary: Total recall, +5 circumstance bonus to remember things.

name: Equipment
summary: 5 points of equipment per rank.

name: Evasion
summary: Circumstance bonus to avoid area effects.

name: Extraordinary Effort
summary: Gain two benefits when using extra effort.

name: Fascinate
summary: Use an interaction skill to entrance others.

name: Fast Grab
summary: Make a free grab check after an unarmed attack.

name: Favored Environment
summary: Circumstance bonus to attack or defense in an environment.

name: Favored Foe
summary: Circumstance bonus to certain checks against a type of opponent.

name: Fearless
summary: Immune to fear effects.

name: Grabbing Finesse
summary: Substitute DEX for STR when making grab attacks.

name: Great Endurance
summary: +5 checks involving endurance.

name: Hide in Plain Sight
summary: Hide while observed without need for a diversion.

name: Improved Aim
summary: Double circumstance bonuses for aiming.

name: Improved Critical
summary: +1 to critical threat range with an attack per rank.

name: Improved Defense
summary: +2 bonus to active defense when you take the defend action.

name: Improved Disarm
summary: No penalty for the disarm action.

name: Improved Grab
summary: Make grab attacks with one arm.  Not vulnerable while grabbing.

name: Improved Initiative
summary: +4 bonus to initiative checks per rank.

name: Improved Hold
summary: -5 circumstance penalty to escape from your holds.

name: Improved Smash
summary: No penalty for the smash action.

name: Improved Trip
summary: No penalty for the trip action.

name: Improvised Tools
summary: No penalty for using skills without tools.

name: Improvised Weapon
summary: Use Close Combat: Unarmed skill with improvised weapons, +1 damage bonus.

name: Inspire
summary: Spend a hero point to grant allies a +1 circumstance bonus per rank.

name: Instant Up
summary: Stand from prone as a free action.

name: Interpose
summary: Take an attack meant for an ally.

name: Inventor
summary: Use Technology to create temporary devices.

name: Jack-of-All-Trades
summary: Use any skill untrained.

name: Languages
summary: Speak and understand additional languages.

name: Leadership
summary: Spend a hero point to remove a condition from an ally.

name: Luck
summary: Re-roll a die once per rank.

name: Minion
summary: Gain a follower or minion with (15xrank) power points.

name: Move-by Action
summary: Move both before and after your standard action.

name: Power Attack
summary: Trade attack bonus for effect bonus.

name: Precise Attack
summary: Ignore attack check penalties for either cover or concealment.

name: Prone Fighting
summary: No penalties for fighting while prone.

name: Quick Draw
summary: Draw a weapon as a free action.

name: Ranged Attack
summary: +1 bonus to ranged attack checks per rank.

name: Redirect
summary: Use Deception to redirect a missed attack at another target.

name: Ritualist
summary: Use Expertise (Magic) to create and perform rituals.

name: Second Chance
summary: Re-roll a failed check against a hazard once.

name: Seize Initiative
summary: Spend a hero point to go first in the initiative order.

name: Set-up
summary: Transfer the benefit of an interaction skill to an ally.

name: Sidekick
summary: Gain a sidekick with (5xrank) power points.

name: Skill Mastery
summary: Make routine checks with one skill under any circumstances.

name: Startle
summary: Use Intimidation to feint during combat.

name: Takedown
summary: Free extra attack when you incapacitate a minion.

name: Taunt
summary: Use Deception to demoralize in combat.

name: Teamwork
summary: +5 bonus to support team checks.

name: Throwing Mastery
summary: +1 damage bonus with thrown weapons per rank.

name: Tracking
summary: Use Perception to follow tracks.

name: Trance
summary: Go into a deathlike trance that slows bodily functions.

name: Ultimate Effort
summary: Spend a hero point to get an effective 20 on a specific check.

name: Uncanny Dodge
summary: Not vulnerable when surprised or caught off-guard.

name: Weapon Bind
summary: Free disarm attempt when you actively defend.

name: Weapon Break
summary: Free smash attack when you actively defend.

name: Well-Informed
summary: Immediate Investigation or Persuasion check to know something.
